text:
Created attachment 23060
excel and sourcecode to reproduce bug

Both excel-made and POI-made hyperlinks remain in their original positions when shifting rows with shiftRows. This results cell with link label to be placed different location than cell acting as link.

Source and excel to re-produce attached
it seems to be related to #29957
